---
title: "local_provided.yml"
---

## High-level description
This YAML file defines a configuration for storage settings. It specifies that the storage type is set to "local".

## Symbols

### `storage`
#### Description
The `storage` key is the main configuration block for storage-related settings.

#### Internal Logic
The `storage` block contains a single key-value pair that defines the type of storage to be used.

### `type`
#### Description
The `type` key specifies the storage type, which is set to "local" in this configuration.

#### Inputs
| Name | Type | Description |
|:-----|:-----|:------------|
| type | string | The type of storage to be used |

## Configuration
| Option | Type | Default | Description |
|:-------|:-----|:--------|:------------|
| storage.type | string | "local" | Specifies the type of storage to be used |

This YAML configuration file is likely part of a larger system that supports different storage options. The "local" type suggests that the system is configured to use local storage, as opposed to other potential options like cloud storage or network-attached storage.
